title: Technical Writing Mastery Course for Fire and Emergency Service Personnel

context.prior_knowledge: Basic document drafting skills and experience in firefighting/emergency response tasks
context.additional_context: Modular, practice-oriented education in a collaborative online learning environment, emphasizing the development of high-applicability technical documentation skills for workplace implementation.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately complete fire scene reports according to standard templates.
Learners can restructure emergency response manuals into easily understandable language.
Learners can complete technical documentation for complex disaster scenarios through team-based collaboration
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
